Package com.doa.engine

Class DoaCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doa.engine.DoaCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class DoaCamera
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a camera construct that looks at a certain point in 2D space, this point can be animate. This means DoaCamera is capable of following DoaObjects too. This class is static, therefore has no objects.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.0
    Version:
    2.1.4
    Author:
    Doga Oruc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • adjustCamera

        public static void adjustCamera​(DoaObject objectToFollow,
                                int minX,
                                int minY,
                                int maxX,
                                int maxY)
        Re-initialises the object to follow, maxX and maxY values of the camera construct. If objectToFollow == null, DoaCamera will not follow any object.
        Parameters:
        objectToFollow - object to follow
        minX - camera's min x coordinate bound
        minY - camera's min y coordinate bound
        maxX - camera's max x coordinate bound
        maxY - camera's max y coordinate bound

      • enableMouseZoom

        public static void enableMouseZoom​(DoaObject objectToZoomInto,
                                   float minZ,
                                   float maxZ)
        Enables DoaCamera's zoom capabilities. MouseWheel is used to control the zoom level. If, however, mouseWheel isn't wanted, one can directly change DoaMouse.WHEEL. If objectToZoom == null, DoaCamera will use (0, 0) as center of zoom.
        Parameters:
        objectToZoomInto - object to zoom into
        minZ - camera's min z coordinate bound(min zoom)
        maxZ - camera's max z coordinate bound(max zoom)

      • resetMouseZoom

        public static void resetMouseZoom()
        Resets the current zoom level of DoaCamera back to 1. Zoom of level 1 means no zoom is applied.

      • disableMouseZoom

        public static void disableMouseZoom()
        Disables DoaCamera's zoom capabilities.

      • tick

        public static void tick()
        This method is required to be public, but should never be called explicitly by any class at any time except DoaEngine. If done otherwise, DoaEngine provides no guarantees on the consistency of the internal state of the Camera construct.
